com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.messaging.chat.api

Interface ChatListener


  • public interface ChatListener
    Represents chat events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void chatDeliveryStatusChanged(java.lang.String participant, MessageDeliveryStatus deliveryStatus, java.lang.String messageID)
      This method is called for change of delivery status.
      void chatParticipantStatusChanged(ChatGroupParticipant chatGroupParticipant, java.lang.String groupId)
      This method is called for change of participant status.
      void groupChatEventNotification(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String groupId)
      This method is called when a group chat event arrives.
      void groupChatSessionInvitation(java.util.List<ChatGroupParticipant> chatGroupParticipants, java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String groupName)
      This method is called when a group chat invitation arrives.
      void inboundChatMessageReceived(InboundMessage message)
      This method is called when an inbound chat message arrives.
      void isComposingReceived(java.lang.String participant, MessageState state, long lastActive)
      This method is called when an "is composing" notification arrives.
      void outboundChatMessageSent(OutboundMessage message)
      This method is called when an outbound chat message notification arrives.

      • isComposingReceived

        void isComposingReceived(java.lang.String participant,
                         MessageState state,
                         long lastActive)
        This method is called when an "is composing" notification arrives.
        Parameters:
        participant - the participant that generated the notification
        state - indicates if the participant is composing a message, or has stopped typing
        lastActive - timestamp of last activity

      • groupChatSessionInvitation

        void groupChatSessionInvitation(java.util.List<ChatGroupParticipant> chatGroupParticipants,
                                java.lang.String groupId,
                                java.lang.String groupName)
        This method is called when a group chat invitation arrives.
        Parameters:
        chatGroupParticipants - participants in the chat group
        groupId - group ID
        groupName - group name

      • groupChatEventNotification

        void groupChatEventNotification(java.lang.String type,
                                java.lang.String description,
                                java.lang.String groupId)
        This method is called when a group chat event arrives.
        Parameters:
        type - the event type
        description - the event description
        groupId - group ID
